net.sourceforge.waters.model.compiler.context

Interface BindingContext

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    VariableContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AliasBindingContext, EFAModuleContext, EFSMModuleContext, ModuleBindingContext, SingleBindingContext, SingleBindingVariableContext

    public interface BindingContext
    Context information to show how an item was instantiated during compilation. A binding context basically maps names to their bound values. In addition, it provides access to a module context (ModuleBindingContext) that can provide further information if the item was compiled as part of an instance (InstanceProxy).
    Author:
    Robi Malik
    See Also:
    SourceInfo

    • Method Detail

      • getBoundExpression

        SimpleExpressionProxy getBoundExpression(SimpleExpressionProxy ident)
        Gets the value bound to the given name.
        Parameters:
        ident - The name to be looked up. It can be identifier, simple or indexed, (to support array lookups), or a unary expression (to support next-state value of EFA variables.
        Returns:
        A variable-free expression representing the concrete value bound to the given name in this context, or null if there is no binding for the given name.

      • isEnumAtom

        boolean isEnumAtom(IdentifierProxy ident)
        Determines whether the given identifier represents an enumeration atom in this context.

      • getModuleBindingContext

        ModuleBindingContext getModuleBindingContext()
        Gets the closest ancestor of this that is a module binding context.
        Returns:
        A module binding context, which may be this context itself.
